name: The 2nd Workshop on Internet of Things Technologies
content: Publication: Accepted papers of WIOTT 2022 after proper registration and presentation will be published in one of the following international journals: ▷Journal of Communications (JCM, 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print)) Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus; DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc. ▷International Journal of Future Computer and Communication (IJFCC, ISSN: 2010-3751 (Print)) Abstracting/Indexing: Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EI (INSPEC, IET), Google Scholar, EBSCO, etc.
